newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovakia to impose 20 pct import deposits May 1.
newsitem.headline: Slovakia to impose 20 pct import deposits May 1.

text.p: Slovakia plans to impose a 20 percent deposit requirement on imports of unspecified goods from all countries from May 1, 1997, Finance Minister Sergej Kozlik said on Wednesday.
Kozlik said deposits will be required for 180 days in Slovak banks to be named later this month.
"This is our reaction to Czech measures, approved last week, but our measures cannot be understood as only against the Czech Republic," Kozlik said.
